DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety immunogenicity investigational hepatitis B vaccine ( HEPLISAV ) adults 18 70 year age .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Immunogenicity Study Hepatitis B Vaccine , HEPLISAV™ , Compared Engerix-B® Vaccine
DOC.criteria: A subject must meet follow criterion eligible trial : Be 1870 year age , inclusive Able comprehend follow require study procedure available visit schedule study If woman childbearing potential , must consistently use acceptable method contraception confirm write abstain sexual activity Screening Visit Week 28 . Able willing provide inform consent A subject one follow criterion eligible trial : Previous receipt hepatitis B vaccine History hepatitis B human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) infection positive test HBsAg , antiHBs , antibody hepatitis B core antigen ( antiHBc ) , antibody HIV History autoimmune disorder History sensitivity component study vaccine Has receive follow prior first injection : 1 . Within 28 day : Any vaccine Systemic corticosteroid ( 3 consecutive day ) immunomodulators immune suppressive medication Granulocyte colonystimulating factor ( GCSF ) granulocytemacrophage colonystimulating factor ( GMCSF ) Any investigational medicinal agent 2 . Within 90 day : Blood product immunoglobulin 3 . At time : An injection DNA plasmid oligonucleotide If female : Pregnant , nursing , plan become pregnant trial Is undergo chemotherapy expect receive chemotherapy study period ; diagnosis cancer within last 5 year squamous basal cell carcinoma skin Any medical condition consider investigator likely interfere subject 's compliance interpretation study assessment
